scripts.prepack:assets-cleanup: pnpm -C lib/functions/assets-cleanup run build && pnpm -C lib/functions/assets-cleanup run install-layer
scripts.prepack:access-logs-analysis: pnpm -C lib/functions/access-logs-analysis/group-by-date run build && pnpm -C lib/functions/access-logs-analysis/group-by-date run install-layer && pnpm -C lib/functions/access-logs-analysis/partitioning run build && pnpm -C lib/functions/access-logs-analysis/partitioning run install-layer
scripts.prepack: pnpm run prepack:assets-cleanup && pnpm run prepack:access-logs-analysis && pnpm run build
